parameters.name: application_name
parameters.description:
Filter down to document folders only relevant for the application
name provided.

post.summary:
Merge the notification preferences which are currently available with the
preferences provided in SetNotificationPreferencesRequest

is_limited_company_private.description:
Is this is false we assume is it a public limited company
otherwise it is a private limited company.

start.description: The start date the defendant started their custodial sentence.

served_months.description:
The total amount of full months served for example 4 years
6 months would be 54.
Please include any suspended sentences.

currency_code.description: The 3-letter currency code defined in ISO 4217.

units.description:
The whole units of the amount.
For example if `currencyCode` is `"USD"`, then 1 unit is one US dollar.

nanos.description:
Number of nano (10^-9) units of the amount.
The value must be between -999,999,999 and +999,999,999 inclusive.
If `units` is positive, `nanos` must be positive or zero.
If `units` is zero, `nanos` can be positive, zero, or negative.
If `units` is negative, `nanos` must be negative or zero.
For example $-1.75 is represented as `units`=-1 and `nanos`=-750,000,000.

currency_code.description: The 3-letter currency code defined in ISO 4217.

units.description:
The whole units of the amount.
For example if `currencyCode` is `"USD"`, then 1 unit is one US dollar.

nanos.description:
Number of nano (10^-9) units of the amount.
The value must be between -999,999,999 and +999,999,999 inclusive.
If `units` is positive, `nanos` must be positive or zero.
If `units` is zero, `nanos` can be positive, zero, or negative.
If `units` is negative, `nanos` must be negative or zero.
For example $-1.75 is represented as `units`=-1 and `nanos`=-750,000,000.

googletypeMoney.description: Represents an amount of money with its currency type.

region.description:
Required. ISO-3166 three letter code of the country/region of the address.
This is never inferred and it is up to the user to ensure the value is
correct. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes
for details.
Example: "GBR" for United Kingdom.

type_url.description:
A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized
protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least
one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent
the fully qualified name of the type (as in
`path/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form
(e.g., leading "." is not accepted).

In practice, teams usually precompile into the binary all types that they
expect it to use in the context of Any. However, for URLs which use the
scheme `http`, `https`, or no scheme, one can optionally set up a type
server that maps type URLs to message definitions as follows:

* If no scheme is provided, `https` is assumed.
* An HTTP GET on the URL must yield a [google.protobuf.Type][]
  value in binary format, or produce an error.
* Applications are allowed to cache lookup results based on the
  URL, or have them precompiled into a binary to avoid any
  lookup. Therefore, binary compatibility needs to be preserved
  on changes to types. (Use versioned type names to manage
  breaking changes.)

Note: this functionality is not currently available in the official
protobuf release, and it is not used for type URLs beginning with
type.googleapis.com.

Schemes other than `http`, `https` (or the empty scheme) might be
used with implementation specific semantics.

value.description: Must be a valid serialized protocol buffer of the above specified type.

name.title:
The full name of the application for example:
applications.cosmicapis.com/organisations/{organisationId}/commercial-mortgage/{applicationId}

status.description: The current status of the application in a human friendly way.

label.description:
Friendly name for the application for example "£175,000 Commercial mortgage @ 75% LTV"
or "£35,000 Business Loan".

adviser.description: The name of the primary adviser who is handling the application.

created.description: The time the application was created.

is_own_home.description: When true the property type MUST be PROPERTY_TYPE_RESIDENTIAL.

name.title:
The full name of the company for example:
companies.cosmicapis.com/organisations/{organisationId}/companies/{companyId}

label.title: The label of the company for example "Legalwebb UK Ltd"

avatar_url.description: If uploaded then a URL to the companies logo.

company_number.description: The company number as registered at HMRC.

company_type.description: The type of company according to HMRC.

sic_codes.title:
A list of SIC code strings structured in the following way:
"6021:National Commercial Bank" "6022:State Commercial Bank"

name.title:
The full name of the company for example:
companies.cosmicapis.com/organisations/{organisationId}/companies/{companyId}

label.title: The label of the company for example "Legalwebb UK Ltd"

credit_score_value.description: The company credit score when last checked, this value is out of 999.

credit_score_last_checked.description: The last time the credit score was checked.

assigned_to.title:
Resource identifier for either of the following resources:
- customers.cosmicapis.com/Profile
- companies.cosmicapis.com/Company

label.title: The label for the collection for example "Identification"

applications.description:
A list of application resource identifiers that requires this
collection to be filled.

companies.description: All the companies the customer is linked too.

asset_count.description: The total count of assets the customer has.

linked_accounts_packages.description: The total number of accounts packages the customer has linked.

linked_bank_accounts.description: The total number of bank accounts the customer has linked.

identity_is_verified.title: Has the customer gone through identity verification?

net_worth.description: The total net-worth of the customer.

total_monthly_repayment.description: The full payment amount each month by all parties.

ownership_percentage.description: What percentage of the liability is paid by this customer.

category.description:
A notification category.
@todo(bweston92): list available notification categories.

enabled_sms.description:
Whether or not the customer would like to receive
notifications via SMS for this category.

enabled_email.description:
Whether or not the customer would like to receive
notifications via e-mail for this category.

belongs_to.title:
Resource identifier for either of the following resources
that the ownership belongs to:
- customers.cosmicapis.com/Profile
- companies.cosmicapis.com/Company

name.title:
The full name for the customer profile resource.
@OutputOnly

nationality.title:
A ISO-3166 country code relating to a nationality.
See more: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1

time_in_united_kingdom_months.description:
The total amount of full months lived in the U.K for example 4
years 6 months would be 54.

has_criminal_convictions.title: Has the customer had any criminal convictions for theft, fraud or dishonesty?
